task.title: Set license key for SolidFire eSDS
task.shortdesc: When you create a SolidFire eSDS cluster, you need the license key information. NetApp Support will also need the license key information for help with issue resolution. The license key for the SolidFire eSDS cluster consists of the cluster's order number combined with the serial number, and activates the capacity term license model you have purchased.

taskbody.context:
You can use the SetLicenseKey method to set the license key for the SolidFire eSDS storage cluster. The SetLicenseKey method has the following input parameters:
NameDescriptionTypeDefault value Required
orderNumberThe new sales order number for this storage cluster.stringNoneYes
serialNumberThe new serial number for this storage cluster.stringNoneYesThis method has the following return values:
NameDescriptionType
orderNumberThe new sales order number of the storage cluster.string
serialNumberThe new serial number of the storage cluster.string
